    • Uses of OrderedItem in Data

      Methods in Data with parameters of type OrderedItem 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Order.addOrderedItem(OrderedItem orderedItem)
      Add an ordered item into the list of ordered items that belongs to this order.
      boolean OrderedItemDAO.delete(OrderedItem orderedItem)
      This function deletes a existing ordered item in the text file.
      boolean OrderedItemDAO.insert(OrderedItem orderedItem)
      This function get the current running ID for Ordered Item and increment it to set it as the ordered item's id that is to be inserted.
      void Order.removeOrderedItem(OrderedItem orderedItem)
      Remove an ordered item from the list of ordered items that belongs to this order.
